Work easily while traveling for business in a large desk with convenient outlets, ergonomic desk chair and complimentary internet access. Enjoy free daily breakfast in the recently renovated Gatehouse, social hours and 24 hour access to the hotel’s updated fitness center. This downtown Charlottesville, VA hotel is in close proximity to the University of Virginia (UVA), JPJ Arena and just a short drive from Thomas Jefferson's Monticello. Enjoy your stay at the Residence Inn Charlottesville, Virginia hotel.

description:
Enjoy a convenient location near shopping, dining and entertainment opportunities when you stay at Homewood Suites by Hilton® Charlottesville, VA. The Seminole Square Shopping Center and the Fashion Square Mall are just minutes from our extended-stay Charlottesville hotel. Historic downtown Charlottesville is just a short drive away, and no trip to Charlottesville is complete without a visit to the Downtown Mall - one of the longest pedestrian malls in the United States. Visit the campus of the University of Virginia, or enjoy a scenic drive on the Blue Ridge Parkway. Guests at our all-suite hotel in Charlottesville can enjoy easy access to famous historical sites including the beautiful Monticello.

Unwind in a spacious studio or one bedroom suite at this extended-stay hotel in Charlottesville, VA. Feel at home with a full kitchen, watch DirectTV channels on one of two HDTVs and check emails with complimentary WiFi at the ergonomic desk. Buy snacks and essentials in the 24-hour Suite Shop or have your items delivered direct to your door with our complimentary grocery shopping service.

Plan a successful event for up to 100 guests with two modern meeting rooms and stay connected in the complimentary business center. Start your day with a complimentary hot full breakfast and Monday through Thursday evenings, unwind with a complimentary light meal and drinks* at our Evening Reception. Enjoy fantastic amenities at this all-suite Charlottesville hotel, including a complimentary fitness center, indoor swimming pool, whirlpool and sports court.

*Subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

description:
a vacation city fit for a queen...

welcome to the Hampton Inn & Suites Charlottesville-At The University.

The stunning brick streets, charming restaurants and lovely shops of downtown Charlottesville are just five blocks from the Hampton Inn & Suites® hotel in Charlottesville-At The University. Thomas Jefferson's world-famous home, Monticello, is just four miles from our location. You'll find golf, culture and scenic drives all within a short distance of our hotel in Charlottesville.

Our pretty city was named for Sophia Charlotte of Mecklenburg-Strelitz, the wife of King George III. Its cozy spot in the Blue Ridge Mountains makes it a natural vacation area. Yet it may be the history of Charlottesville that most attracts people to our city. From our three presidents to the University of Virginia, you'll find our amazing past to draw visitors from around the world. So come see for yourself at the Hampton Inn & Suites hotel in Charlottesville-At The University. We think you'll agree that Charlottesville is a vacation city fit for a queen.

services & amenities

Here at the Hampton Inn & Suites Charlottesville-At The University, we're passionate about taking good care of you. That's why we offer a broad range of services and amenities to make your stay exceptional.

Whether you're planning a corporate meeting or need accommodations for a family reunion or your child's sporting group, we're delighted to offer you easy planning and booking tools to make the process quick and organized.

* Meetings & Events

* Local Restaurant Guide

description: You’ll love the downtown location and fresh, new look of the Courtyard Charlottesville - University Medical Center. Our newly-renovated Charlottesville hotel is near the University of Virginia and the UVA Medical Center. We're also just minutes from John Paul Jones Arena, Monticello, and Scott Stadium, as well as the Monticello Wine Trail. Each room in our University of Virginia hotel features free Wi-Fi, 32” flat-screen TVs, refrigerators, microwaves and upscale bedding. Suites and hospitality king rooms also offer a wet bar. Our hotel lobby boasts a meeting space, business library, and 52" GoBoard touch-screen TV. The Bistro offers delicious breakfasts and dinners, and beverages from Starbucks and our full bar. Eat. Drink. Connect. You can unwind in our heated indoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness room. Planning an event or meeting? Let us know - our largest space can host up to 150. Few hotels in Charlottesville near the University Medical Center can match our attention to detail, so book today.

description: Allow yourself to be taken back in time while enjoying your stay at Graduate Charlottesville .  Our hotel is located in the heart of this history rich city, walking distance from the University of Virginia, the Rotunda and the Lawn .  Its convenient Main Street location allows you easy access to all the restaurants, shops, galleries and more .  The fun will continue back at the hotel at our cafe and open-air bar .  Maybe challenge your friends to a game of Foosball or Ping Pong in our game room .  Come experience this bustling city with us as well as relax in your room with HD TV, complementary Wi-Fi, docking stations, refrigerator, coffee maker, Malin and Goetz amenities, and more .   This is Graduate - get ready to be inspired .

description: The Comfort of Home at the Gateway of all Charlottesville has to Offer Welcome to Holiday Inn® University Area , the perfect location for leisure stays, social occasions, corporate meetings, and conferences. We are conveniently located on Route 29 near the University of Virginia. We offer complimentary shuttle service to/from nearby Charlottesville-Albemarle Airport (CHO). Our spacious guest rooms include free Wi-Fi , a refrigerator, microwave, and 37in HDTV. Take in the rich history of C’ville at Thomas Jefferson's Monticello , James Madison's Montpelier, James Monroe's Ashland, and lunch at Michie Tavern. Taste and tour at an area winery or visit one of the many seasonal family-friendly festivals. The hotel is near many corporate and government offices including Northrop Grumman, NGIC, State Farm, Lexis Nexis, JAG, CFA Institute, Siemens, GE, Federal Executive Institute, and UVA Research Park. Enjoy great shopping and restaurants at Barracks Road or the city's newest upscale center, The Shops at Stonefield, which is adjacent to the hotel. Stroll the Downtown Pedestrian Mall or take in a show or sporting event at John Paul Jones Arena. The hotel offers casual dining at Emmet's Restaurant and Lounge , open for breakfast and dinner or room service in the comfort of your room. Take a dip in our heated indoor pool or workout in our Fitness Center. We look forward to welcoming you soon.

description:
where history's masterpieces meet Virginia's beauty...

welcome to the Hampton Inn Charlottesville.

You've seen Monticello on the back of a nickel. Now come see Thomas Jefferson's home in person (it's much prettier!), just a short drive from the Hampton Inn® hotel in Charlottesville. Aside from Jefferson's hilltop masterpiece, we're home to an amazing collection of historical sites, from the campus of the University of Virginia to James Monroe's home, Ash Lawn. It's all near our hotel in Charlottesville.

When you check into our hotel, you'll find so much more than history. We have a vibrant downtown with excellent galleries, museums, shops and restaurants. The surrounding countryside is full of world-class vineyards as well as the legendary Blue Ridge Parkway and Skyline Drive. So come check into the Hampton Inn hotel in Charlottesville, where history's masterpieces meet Virginia's beauty.

services & amenities

Here at the Hampton Inn Charlottesville, we're passionate about taking good care of you. That's why we offer a broad range of services and amenities to make your stay exceptional.

Whether you're planning a corporate meeting or need accommodations for a family reunion or your child's sporting group, we're delighted to offer you easy planning and booking tools to make the process quick and organized.

description: A boutique hotel at the University, the Oakhurst Inn offers modern luxury with historic charm in the heart of Charlottesville Virginia. All twenty-seven elegant guestrooms have been carefully renovated to provide modern comforts while preserving 1920's craftsmanship. Our four historic buildings are connected by garden paths, just steps away from the grounds of the University of Virginia.  Libraries have been arranged with custom and antique furnishings where guests are welcome to relax around the fireplaces and enjoy complimentary refreshments, games and books.  Many rooms are accessible only by stairs.  Please call 434.872.0100 and our guest service associates will arrange to accommodate any special needs.

description: Always fresh, always clean - our guest rooms are full of thoughtful amenities, including Free High Speed Wireless Internet, coffee maker, a remote controlled TV with cable.  We will get you started each day with a complimentary Super Start Breakfast that includes hot, freshly brewed coffee, tea, and juice.  The Super 8 is conveniently located on the North Side of Charlottesville on 29 North, across from Golden Corral Restaurant.  We are within minutes from local business districts, Historic downtown and UVA. New smart bedding and 27 Flat Screen TVs in all rooms. Microwaves and refrigerators are available in some rooms.  Please note - Pets are only allowed in our 2 Queen smoking bed rooms located on the 2nd floor and our 2 Queen non smoking rooms located on the 1st floor.

description: Welcome to the newly-renovated Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Charlottesville hotel, located near the nationally acclaimed University of Virginia Cavaliers in the heart of beautiful Charlottesville, Virginia. Our UVA hotel is near John Paul Jones Arena, host of ACC Basketball games, major sporting events and concerts.  Businesses conveniently located nearby our Charlottesville business hotel are State Farm, General Electric, JAG, NGIC, Northrop Grumman, Frank Lill, Martha Jefferson Hospital and the UVA Medical Center. Our Charlottesville, VA hotel is a short drive from the historical sites of Monticello, Ash Lawn, Highland, and Montpelier.  Enjoy panoramic views of the Blue Ridge Mountains and Skyline Drive area.  Nearby Wintergreen Resort offers skiing, hiking, biking and golf.  Rockfish Valley of Nelson County is a short drive to some of the area's finest wineries. The Historic Downtown Mall, Charlottesville Pavilion, and Paramount Theater are just minutes away.

description: The newly renovated Courtyard Charlottesville North Hotel is conveniently located off Route 29 North, just minutes from historic downtown. This hotel in Charlottesville, VA is near a variety of shops and restaurants at Fashion Square, as well as the University of Virginia (UVA), home of the Cavaliers. Our updated Charlottesville hotel is a short drive from Monticello Plantation, and in close proximity to Shenandoah National Park. For kids, we are also located near the Virginia Discovery Museum. The state-of-the-art lobby features flexible spaces, free Wi-Fi and access to news, weather and airport conditions via our GoBoard®. The highlight of our lobby experience is The Bistro. Eat. Drink. Connect. Enjoy enhanced food and beverage, dinner service or The Market. Enjoy complimentary shuttle service to the Charlottesville-Albemarle Airport from 7am-11pm, and on-site fitness center and pool.

description: Welcome to Holiday Inn Monticello. We are nestled in the foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains, we are 2 miles from the Historic Downtown Mall. We are the closest hotel to attractions such as: Monticello; Ash Lawn-Highland and Michie Tavern, and only 1 mile from the University of Virginia and the UVA Hospital. Our hotel is just minutes away from the numerous arts and entertainment events held at the Paramount Theatre, Downtown Pavilion, Ash-Lawn Opera, and our newest venue, the John Paul Jones Arena also known as The Jack or JPJ. For visitors traveling on business, we are close to State Farm Regional Office, Wal-Mart Distribution, AREVA, DuPont, 3COM, Lexis Nexis, SNL Securities, Klockner Pentaplast, UVA Medical Center, Martha Jefferson Hospital, and Luck Stone Corp. This Charlottesville hotel features comfortably appointed rooms, free high-speed Internet, local phone calls, HBO, irons & boards, hair dryers and coffee makers. The full service restaurant, Charlottes, serves breakfast, dinner and room service daily. We have over 2200 square feet of versatile meeting and banquet space to host events for business meetings, weddings, reunions, and events. Let our experienced staff focus on the details to ensure that your event is a complete success.

description:
Boars Head Inn is an AAA Four-Diamond rated classic country resort offering every modern amenity with all the grace and charm of times past . Boars Head Inn is home to one of the areas finest restaurants a nationally acclaimed golf course a luxurious spa and state-of-the-art Sports Club .

Nestled in the foothills of the legendary Blue Ridge Mountains and just five minutes from downtown Charlottesville and ten miles from the Charlottesville airport Boars Head Inn is within easy reach of Central Virginias rich historic cultural and outdoors offerings . Stroll the grounds of the University of Virginia or step back in time with visits to Monticello Montpelier and other historic sites . Tour one of over 20 area wineries or soar above it all in a hot air balloon . The possibilities are endless .



With its gracious hospitality award-winning service and a warm and courteous staff Boars Head Inn creates memories that last a lifetime .

description:
The Hilton Garden Inn Charlottesville hotel in Charlottesville, Virginia is located in Peter Jefferson Place Business Park - formerly Thomas Jefferson's father’s property. Surrounded by beautiful rolling hills and water, the Hilton Garden Inn is the ideal choice for business and leisure guests. The HGI Charlottesville is a mere 4 miles from James Monroe’s Ash-Lawn Highland, 3 miles from Thomas Jefferson’s Monticello and 2 miles from Michie Tavern. The Hilton Garden Inn Charlottesville is convenient to the University of Virginia, John Paul Jones Arena, Paramount Theater, Jefferson Theater, Historic Downtown Mall, the brand new Martha Jefferson Hospital and State Farm Regional Offices.

Charlottesville is easily accessible by air or interstate and features elegant architecture, a quaint university town feel, a burgeoning wine industry and outdoor recreational options spanning four distinct seasons.

Our complimentary shuttle service to all points Charlottesville is designed to ensure your arrival/departure to/from Charlottesville, VA and all stops in between, are smooth and hassle-free while our spacious hotel rooms guarantee comfort and relaxation.

Hilton Garden Inn Charlottesville Hotel Amenities

* Non-smoking rooms and accessible rooms

* Full service Great American Grill® for breakfast and dinner

* Evening Room Service

* Pavilion Lounge

* Indoor Pool and Whirlpool

* Workout facility and Stay Fit Kit® available for check-out

* 24-hour Pavilion Pantry convenience mart

* Complimentary 24-hour business center

* Complimentary wireless high-speed Internet access throughout the hotel

* Complimentary outdoor parking

* Valet and self laundry available

* Complimentary shuttle on demand for Charlottesville area usage

Hilton Garden Inn hotel in Charlottesville, Virginia Room Amenities

* Complimentary wired and wireless high-speed Internet and secure, remote printing to the Business Center

* Kings and Double Queens

* Refrigerator, Microwave and coffee maker

* King rooms have the self adjusting Garden Sleep System™ beds

* Large work desk with convenient desk-level outlets, adjustable lighting and ergonomic Mirra® chair by Herman Miller

* Two Telephones featuring voicemail, speaker capability and data port

* Hair dryer, iron and ironing board

* 32" flat screen high-definition television with on-demand movies, video games and complimentary HBO®

* USA Today® delivered each weekday morning

* Individual climate control

* Innovative, easy-to-set alarm clock radio with jack for portable music player

Hilton Garden Inn hotel in Charlottesville Meeting Space Amenities

* Hilton Garden Inn Charlottesville Meeting Space is 1,700sq. ft. of divisible meeting and banquet space to accommodate up to 100 guests. All meeting rooms have state of the art A/V equipment and sound system. Theater, Rounds, Classroom, U-Shape styles available.

* Peter Jefferson Conference Room - 1,357 sq. ft. (120) People

* Peter Jefferson Conference Room A OR B - 667 sq. ft. (60) per

* Thomas Jefferson Board Room - Accommodates 14 - State-of-the-art A/V

* Martha Jefferson Patio (overlooks swan pond) at Jefferson Place (120)

* Lobby/Restaurant areas available for customization

*****Everything. Right where you need it.®*****

description:
Unwind in DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Charlottesville after exploring our city. Our Charlottesville, Virginia hotel overlooks the Rivanna River and is five miles from the University of Virginia, John Paul Jones Arena and the Charlottesville-Albermarle Airport. Enjoy a warm chocolate chip cookie, our gift to you.

Admire fresh flowers in the lobby, the winding staircase to the Promenade Ballroom and the outside garden terrace. Take the bridge walkway to the guest room tower.

Relax in one of 235 spacious guest rooms, one-bedroom suites or Executive Level suites. With the upgrade, you can dine at the Executive Lounge for weekday continental breakfast and sip cocktails at evening receptions Monday through Thursday. Listen to your favorite music on the MP3 alarm clock while brewing a cup of coffee. Plan your itinerary at the large work desk in the comfortable, ergonomic chair.

Dine at TJ’s Tavern and Dining Room and enjoy the view, or order room service for a private meal. Call for our shuttle to take you to a restaurant within five miles of our hotel. Take advantage of complimentary amenities such as WiFi and remote printing, a 24-hour business center, indoor pool and fitness center with modern equipment.

What sets us apart from other Charlottesville, VA hotels is that we are the city’s largest conference facility with more than 20,000 sq. ft. Host a dinner for four or conference for 600. Let our sales and catering team customize an exceptional meeting, wedding or reunion.
